data.title: You put the DEL in Delmarva Public Media!
data.meta_description:
What we do: Every day we provide every individual throughout the Delmarva Peninsula information that helps them make good decisions and connect with opportunities, perspective that helps them understand a complex world and with music that brings them joy and lifts their spirits. 

Who we are: Our three stations are connected to two Universities – Salisbury University and the University of Maryland Eastern Shore – which provides us the opportunity to engage students in the power of media and define the next generation of public media. 

Delmarva Public Media has been bringing music and news to Sussex and Kent Counties since 1987.  Help us Do More in the future by donating today!
data.text:
About Delmarva Public Media

Mission: The mission of Delmarva Public Media is to use the radio to bring to the people of Delmarva the highest accomplishments of our society in music and the arts, to provide opportunities for the citizens of the area to be fully informed about the issues that affect their lives, and to ensure that the population of the peninsula can benefit from programming unavailable from other sources.
